questions: Is there a pair of sunglasses in the image?
Is there a mirror in the image?
Are the sunglasses under the mirror?
Are the sunglasses white in color?
Is the mirror green in color?
model_output:
yes, there is a pair of sunglasses in the image because they are clearly visible.
yes, there is a mirror in the image because it is reflecting the image of the sunglasses.
no, the sunglasses are not under the mirror because they are placed on top of the mirror.
yes, the sunglasses are white in color because their frames are white.
yes, the mirror is green in color because it has a green tint.
